title: A Land lived in
creator_credit: Alan Harper, National Trust for Scotland and Campbell Harper Films
brief_description: The work of the National Trust for Scotland. By restoring and protecting the properties and estates which have been placed under its care, the Trust helps to preserve the great historical and artistic landmarks of Scotland. The film brings out the historical associations of famous places, with a background of Scottish folk song.
